00029 typedef string RunName;

00031 struct ResultMean
00032 {
00033    map<Time, double> first;
00034    map< Time, vector<double> >   second;
00035    string   YTitle;
00036 
00037    // used for histogram limits
00038    double       min_value, max_value;
00039    double       mean, sigma;
00040 };
00041 
00042 
00044 void FillFromHist(TH1F *h, double startTime, ResultMean &result, ResultMean &result_err)
00045 {
00046    // there are few alpha runs which don't have any data in their channels, skip them
00047    if ((!h) || (!h->GetEntries())) return;
00048 
00049    TFitResultPtr fitres = h->Fit("pol0", "QS"); // Q: quiet, S: return fitres
00050 
00051    result.first[startTime] = fitres->Value(0);
00052    result_err.first[startTime] = fitres->FitResult::Error(0);
00053 
00054    result.second[startTime].resize(N_DETECTORS);
00055    result_err.second[startTime].resize(N_DETECTORS);
00056 
00057    for (int det = 0; det < N_DETECTORS; det++)
00058    {
00059       int xmin = 0.5 + det * NSTRIP_PER_DETECTOR;
00060       int xmax = xmin + NSTRIP_PER_DETECTOR;
00061 
00062       TFitResultPtr fitres = h->Fit("pol0", "QS", "", xmin, xmax); // Q: quiet, S: return fitres
00063 
00064       if (fitres.Get())
00065       {
00066          result.second[startTime][det] = fitres->Value(0);
00067          result_err.second[startTime][det] = fitres->FitResult::Error(0);
00068       }
00069       else
00070       {
00071          result.second[startTime][det] = NAN;
00072          result_err.second[startTime][det] = NAN;
00073       }
00074    }
00075 
00076    result.YTitle = h->GetYaxis()->GetTitle();
00077 }

00079 
00080 void FillDeviceMaxMin(map<Short_t, ResultMean> &results)
00081 {
00082    double min_value = FLT_MAX;
00083    double max_value = -FLT_MAX;
00084 
00085    double mean_sum = 0;
00086    int count = 0;
00087 
00088    for (map<Short_t, ResultMean>::const_iterator i = results.begin(); i != results.end(); i++)
00089    {
00090       const ResultMean &result = i->second;
00091 
00092       for (int det = 0; det < N_DETECTORS; det++)
00093       {
00094          // find min and max values
00095          for (map< Time, vector<double> >::const_iterator it = result.second.begin(); it != result.second.end(); it++)
00096          {
00097             double value = it->second[det];
00098             if (min_value > value)
00099             {
00100                min_value = value;
00101             }
00102             if (max_value < value)
00103             {
00104                max_value = value;
00105             }
00106          }
00107 
00108          // also we use information about mean values and their width
00109          // to calculate limits for plots that are not interested in outliers (such as PlotMean())
00110          for (map< Time, vector<double> >::const_iterator it = result.second.begin(); it != result.second.end(); it++)
00111          {
00112             double value = it->second[det];
00113             if (!isnan(value))
00114             {
00115                mean_sum += value;
00116                count++;
00117             }
00118          }
00119       }
00120    }
00121    double mean = mean_sum / count;
00122 
00123    int count_crosscheck = 0;
00124    double sigma_sum = 0;
00125    for (map<Short_t, ResultMean>::const_iterator i = results.begin(); i != results.end(); i++)
00126    {
00127       const ResultMean &result = i->second;
00128 
00129       for (int det = 0; det < N_DETECTORS; det++)
00130       {
00131          for (map< Time, vector<double> >::const_iterator it = result.second.begin(); it != result.second.end(); it++)
00132          {
00133             double value = it->second[det];
00134             if (!isnan(value))
00135             {
00136                sigma_sum += (mean - value) * (mean - value);
00137                count_crosscheck++;
00138             }
00139          }
00140       }
00141    }
00142    assert(count == count_crosscheck);
00143    double sigma = sqrt(sigma_sum / count);
00144 
00145    for (map<Short_t, ResultMean>::iterator i = results.begin(); i != results.end(); i++)
00146    {
00147       ResultMean &result = i->second;
00148       result.min_value = min_value;
00149       result.max_value = max_value;
00150       result.mean = mean;
00151       result.sigma = sigma;
00152    }
00153 }
00154 
00155 
00156 Color_t GetLineColor(int det)
00157 {
00158    Color_t  line_color = det + 2;
00159    if (line_color == 5)
00160    {
00161       line_color = 28;
00162    }
00163    return line_color;
00164 }

00168 void PlotMean(DrawObjContainer *oc, const string &polIdName, const char *name, ResultMean &result, ResultMean &result_err, map<Time, RunName> &runNameD, double min_startTime, double max_startTime)
00169 {
00170    if (result.first.empty() && result.second.empty())
00171    {
00172       return;
00173    }
00174 
00175    ObjMap   &o = oc->o;
00176    TH1F  *h;
00177 
00178    TString hname(name);
00179    hname += polIdName;
00180    if (max_startTime)
00181    {
00182       h = new TH1F(hname, name, 100 * result.first.size(), -86400, max_startTime - min_startTime + 86400);
00183    }
00184    else
00185    {
00186       h = new TH1F(hname, name, result.first.size(), 0.0, 1.0);
00187    }
00188    o[name] = h;
00189 
00190    int bin = 1;
00191    for (map< Time, double >::iterator it = result.first.begin(); it != result.first.end(); it++)
00192    {
00193       double startTime = it->first;
00194       const RunName &runName = runNameD[startTime];
00195       double value = it->second;
00196 
00197       if (max_startTime)
00198       {
00199          bin = h->FindBin(startTime - min_startTime);
00200       }
00201 
00202       h->SetBinContent(bin, value);
00203       h->SetBinError(bin, result_err.first[startTime]);
00204 
00205       if (!max_startTime)
00206       {
00207          h->GetXaxis()->SetBinLabel(bin, runName.c_str());
00208          bin++;
00209       }
00210    }
00211 
00212    if (max_startTime)
00213    {
00214       h->GetXaxis()->SetTimeDisplay(1);
00215       h->GetXaxis()->SetTimeFormat("%m/%d/%y");
00216       h->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(min_startTime);
00217       h->GetXaxis()->SetNdivisions(8);
00218    }
00219    h->SetYTitle(result.YTitle.c_str());
00220 
00221    double vpadding = (result.max_value - result.min_value) * 0.15;
00222    h->GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(result.min_value - vpadding, result.max_value + vpadding);
00223 
00224    TH1F *hdet = 0;
00225    if (!max_startTime) // check if we are doing by_run plots
00226    {
00227       // we only do by_run distribution, since by_day will be the same
00228       for (int det = 0; det < N_DETECTORS; det++)
00229       {
00230          TString hname(name);
00231          hname += "_distribution";
00232          hname += (det + 1);
00233          hname += "_";
00234          hname += polIdName;
00235          hdet = new TH1F(hname, hname, 100, result.min_value, result.max_value);
00236          hdet->SetXTitle(h->GetYaxis()->GetTitle());
00237          hdet->SetLineColor(GetLineColor(det));
00238          for (map< Time, vector<double> >::iterator it = result.second.begin(); it != result.second.end(); it++)
00239          {
00240             double value = it->second[det];
00241             hdet->Fill(value);
00242          }
00243          hdet->Fit("gaus", "QW"); // Q: quiet, W: all weights = 1
00244          o[hname.Data()] = hdet;
00245       }
00246    }
00247 
00248    TString  canvasName("c");
00249    canvasName += name;
00250    canvasName += "_";
00251    canvasName += polIdName;
00252    TString  title(name);
00253    const char *cut_str = " (cut: |val-mean_i|<3*sigma_i)";
00254    title += cut_str;
00255    TCanvas *c = new TCanvas(canvasName, "", 800, 500);
00256    double bm = gStyle->GetPadBottomMargin();
00257    TLegend *leg = new TLegend(0.14,bm+0.02,0.22,bm+0.202);
00258    TH1F  *host, *det_host;
00259    vector<TH1F*>  det_hosts;
00260    TString  host_name("_");
00261    host_name += name;
00262    host_name += polIdName;
00263    if (max_startTime)
00264    {
00265       host = new TH1F(host_name, title, 100 * result.first.size(), -86400, max_startTime - min_startTime + 86400);
00266    }
00267    else
00268    {
00269       host = new TH1F(host_name, title, result.first.size(), 0.0, result.first.size());
00270    }
00271 
00272    double canvas_min = result.mean - 3*result.sigma;
00273    double canvas_max = result.mean + 3*result.sigma;
00274    host->GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(canvas_min, canvas_max);
00275 
00276    for (int det = 0; det < N_DETECTORS; det++)
00277    {
00278       TString   det_host_name(name);
00279       det_host_name += (det+1);
00280       det_host_name += "_";
00281       det_host_name += polIdName;
00282       TString  det_title(det_host_name);
00283       det_title += cut_str;
00284 
00285       if (max_startTime)
00286       {
00287          det_host = new TH1F(det_host_name, det_title, 100 * result.first.size(), -86400, max_startTime - min_startTime + 86400);
00288       }
00289       else
00290       {
00291          det_host = new TH1F(det_host_name, det_title, result.first.size(), 0.0, result.first.size());
00292       }
00293       o[det_host_name.Data()] = det_host;
00294 
00295       TGraphErrors *g = new TGraphErrors(result.second.size());
00296       TGraphErrors *det_g = new TGraphErrors(result.second.size());
00297       Color_t line_color = GetLineColor(det);
00298       g->SetLineColor(line_color);
00299       g->SetMarkerColor(line_color);
00300       g->SetMarkerStyle(20);
00301       g->SetMarkerSize(0.4);
00302       det_g->SetLineColor(line_color);
00303       det_g->SetMarkerColor(line_color);
00304       det_g->SetMarkerStyle(20);
00305       det_g->SetMarkerSize(0.4);
00306       int i = 0;
00307       double xval = -0.5;
00308 
00309       for (map< Time, vector<double> >::iterator it = result.second.begin(); it != result.second.end(); it++)
00310       {
00311          double startTime = it->first;
00312          const RunName &runName = runNameD[startTime];
00313          double value = it->second[det];
00314 
00315          if (max_startTime)
00316          {
00317             xval = startTime - min_startTime;
00318          }
00319          else
00320          {
00321             xval++;
00322             if (i % 5 == 0)
00323             {
00324                TString label(runName);
00325                label = label.ReplaceAll(".alpha0", "");
00326                host->GetXaxis()->SetBinLabel(i + 1, label.Data());
00327                det_host->GetXaxis()->SetBinLabel(i + 1, label.Data());
00328             }
00329          }
00330 
00331          if (isnan(value))
00332          {
00333             g->RemovePoint(i);
00334             det_g->RemovePoint(i);
00335             continue;
00336          }
00337 
00338          if (value > canvas_max)
00339          {
00340             Warning("malpha", "value %f of %s is more than canvas_max of %f",
00341                value, result.YTitle.c_str(), canvas_max);
00342          }
00343          if (value < canvas_min)
00344          {
00345             Warning("malpha", "value %f of %s is less than canvas_min of %f",
00346                value, result.YTitle.c_str(), canvas_min);
00347          }
00348 
00349          g->SetPoint(i, xval, value);
00350          if (gMeasInfo->IsRunYear(2013))
00351          {
00352             g->SetPointError(i, 0, result_err.second[startTime][det]);
00353          }
00354          det_g->SetPoint(i, xval, value);
00355          det_g->SetPointError(i, 0, result_err.second[startTime][det]);
00356          i++;
00357       }
00358       TString sDet("Det");
00359       sDet += (det + 1);
00360       if (max_startTime)
00361       {
00362          TF1   fit_daily("fit_daily", "pol0");
00363          TF1   det_fit_daily("det_fit_daily", "pol0");
00364          fit_daily.SetLineColor(line_color);
00365          fit_daily.SetLineWidth(0.5);
00366          det_fit_daily.SetLineColor(kBlack);
00367          det_fit_daily.SetLineWidth(0.5);
00368 
00369          if (gMeasInfo->IsRunYear(2013))
00370          {
00371             Warning("malpha", "detected run13 : will fit only during beamtime");
00372             const double fit_min = 1362096000 - min_startTime; // 03/01/2013 00:00:00
00373             const double fit_max = 1372636800 - min_startTime; // 07/01/2013 00:00:00
00374             g->Fit(&fit_daily, "Q", "", fit_min, fit_max); // Q: quiet
00375             det_g->Fit(&det_fit_daily, "Q", "", fit_min, fit_max);   // Q: quiet
00376          }
00377          else
00378          {
00379             g->Fit(&fit_daily, "Q"); // Q: quiet
00380             det_g->Fit(&det_fit_daily, "Q");   // Q: quiet
00381          }
00382       }
00383       g->SetName(sDet);
00384       det_g->SetName(sDet);
00385 
00386       host->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(g, "p");
00387       leg->AddEntry(g, sDet, "pl");
00388       det_host->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(det_g, "p");
00389 
00390       det_host->SetOption("DUMMY GRIDX GRIDY");
00391       det_host->GetXaxis()->SetTimeDisplay(1);
00392       det_host->GetXaxis()->SetTimeFormat("%m/%d/%y");
00393       det_host->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(min_startTime);
00394       det_host->GetXaxis()->SetNdivisions(8);
00395       det_host->SetXTitle(sDet);
00396       det_host->SetYTitle(h->GetYaxis()->GetTitle());
00397       if (!max_startTime)
00398       {
00399          det_host->SetLabelOffset(0.0);
00400       }
00401       det_hosts.push_back(det_host);
00402    }
00403 
00404    host->SetOption("DUMMY GRIDX GRIDY");
00405    host->GetXaxis()->SetTimeDisplay(1);
00406    host->GetXaxis()->SetTimeFormat("%m/%d/%y");
00407    host->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(min_startTime);
00408    host->GetXaxis()->SetNdivisions(8);
00409    host->SetYTitle(h->GetYaxis()->GetTitle());
00410       if (!max_startTime)
00411       {
00412          host->SetLabelOffset(0.0);
00413       }
00414 
00415    for (vector<TH1F*>::iterator it = det_hosts.begin(); it != det_hosts.end(); it++)
00416    {
00417       TH1F  *det_host = *it;
00418       det_host->GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(canvas_min, canvas_max);
00419    }
00420 
00421    host->Draw();
00422    leg->Draw();
00423    o[canvasName.Data()] = c;
00424 
00425    static TCanvas *dummy = new TCanvas();
00426    dummy->cd(); // Don't let anybody draw on our canvas
00427 }

00429 
00430 void PlotCorrelation(DrawObjContainer *oc, const string &polIdName, const char *name, ResultMean &r1, ResultMean &r1_err, ResultMean &r2, ResultMean &r2_err)
00431 {
00432    if ((r1.first.empty() && r1.second.empty()) || (r2.first.empty() && r2.second.empty()))
00433    {
00434       return;
00435    }
00436 
00437    ObjMap   &o = oc->o;
00438    TString  hname(name);
00439    hname += "_";
00440    hname += polIdName;
00441    TH2F  *h = new TH2F(hname, hname,
00442                       r1.max_value - r1.min_value, r1.min_value, r1.max_value,
00443                       r2.max_value - r2.min_value, r2.min_value, r2.max_value);
00444 
00445    for (int det = 0; det < N_DETECTORS; det++)
00446    {
00447       int   i = 0;
00448       TGraphErrors *g = new TGraphErrors(r1.second.size());
00449       Color_t  line_color = det + 2;
00450       if (line_color == 5)
00451       {
00452          line_color = 28;
00453       }
00454       g->SetMarkerColor(line_color);
00455 
00456       for (map< Time, vector<double> >::iterator it = r1.second.begin(); it != r1.second.end(); it++)
00457       {
00458          double startTime = it->first;
00459          double value1 = it->second[det];
00460          if ((!r2.second.count(startTime)) || (!r2.second[startTime].size()))
00461          {
00462             continue;
00463          }
00464          double value2 = r2.second[startTime][det];
00465          if (isnan(value1) || isnan(value2))
00466          {
00467             continue;
00468          }
00469 
00470          g->SetPoint(i, value1, value2);
00471          g->SetPointError(i, r1_err.second[startTime][det], r2_err.second[startTime][det]);
00472          ++i;
00473       }
00474 
00475       h->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(g, "p");
00476    }
00477    h->SetXTitle(r1.YTitle.c_str());
00478    h->SetYTitle(r2.YTitle.c_str());
00479 
00480    o[name] = h;
00481 }
00482 
00483 
00489 vector<double> DoAmGainCorrection(ResultMean &rhAmGain, ResultMean &rhAmGainErr, ResultMean &rBiasCurrent, ResultMean &rhAmGainCorrected, ResultMean &rhAmGainCorrectedErr)
00490 {
00491    vector<double>       slope;
00492 
00493    for(int det = 0; det < N_DETECTORS; det++)
00494    {
00495       int count = 0;
00496       for (map< Time, vector<double> >::iterator it = rhAmGain.second.begin(); it != rhAmGain.second.end(); it++)
00497       {
00498          Time   time = it->first;
00499          vector<double>    &det_gain = it->second;
00500          double    bias_current = rBiasCurrent.second[time].at(det);
00501 
00502          if (rBiasCurrent.second.count(time) && (!isnan(bias_current)) && !isnan(det_gain.at(det)))
00503          {
00504             count++;
00505          }
00506       }
00507       TGraph g(count);
00508       int i = 0;
00509       for (map< Time, vector<double> >::iterator it = rhAmGain.second.begin(); it != rhAmGain.second.end(); it++)
00510       {
00511          Time   time = it->first;
00512          vector<double>    &det_gain = it->second;
00513          double    bias_current = rBiasCurrent.second[time].at(det);
00514 
00515          if (rBiasCurrent.second.count(time) && (!isnan(bias_current)) && !isnan(det_gain.at(det)))
00516          {
00517             g.SetPoint(i, bias_current, det_gain.at(det));
00518             i++;
00519          }
00520       }
00521       assert(i == count);
00522       TFitResultPtr fitres = g.Fit("pol1", "QS"); // Q: quiet, S: return fitres
00523       assert(!isnan(fitres->Value(1)));
00524       slope.push_back(fitres->Value(1));
00525    }
00526 
00527    rhAmGainCorrected = rhAmGain;
00528    rhAmGainCorrectedErr = rhAmGainErr;
00529    rhAmGainCorrected.YTitle = "Corrected americium gain, ADC/keV";
00530 
00531    for (map< Time, vector<double> >::iterator it = rhAmGain.second.begin(); it != rhAmGain.second.end(); it++)
00532    {
00533       Time   time = it->first;
00534       vector<double>    &det_gain = it->second;
00535       for(int det = 0; det < N_DETECTORS; det++)
00536       {
00537          if (rBiasCurrent.second.count(time))
00538          {
00539             rhAmGainCorrected.second[time].at(det) = det_gain.at(det) - slope[det] * rBiasCurrent.second[time].at(det);
00540          }
00541          else
00542          {
00543             // If we can't correct the value, remove it.
00544             rhAmGainCorrected.second[time].at(det) = NAN;
00545          }
00546       }
00547    }
00548    return slope;
00549 }
00550 
00551 
00552 void FillDetectorAverage(ResultMean &result, ResultMean &result_err, double startTime)
00553 {
00554    if (result.second.count(startTime) && !result.second[startTime].empty())
00555    {
00556       result.first[startTime] = accumulate(
00557          result.second[startTime].begin(),
00558          result.second[startTime].end(),
00559          (double)0
00560          ) / result.second[startTime].size();
00561       result_err.first[startTime] = accumulate(
00562          result_err.second[startTime].begin(),
00563          result_err.second[startTime].end(),
00564          (double)0
00565          ) / result_err.second[startTime].size();
00566    }
00567 }

00569 
00570 void FillBiasCurrent(opencdev::LogReader *log_reader, EPolarimeterId polId, double startTime, double endTime, map< Short_t, ResultMean > &rBiasCurrent, map< Short_t, ResultMean > &rBiasCurrentErr)
00571 {
00572    opencdev::mean_result_t bias_mean_value;
00573 
00574    string logger_name = BiasCurrentUtil::GetBiasCurrentLoggerName(polId);
00575    log_reader->query_timerange_mean(logger_name, startTime, endTime, &bias_mean_value);
00576 
00577    rBiasCurrent[polId].second[startTime] = BiasCurrentUtil::FillBiasCurrentMeanValue(bias_mean_value, polId);
00578    rBiasCurrentErr[polId].second[startTime].resize(N_DETECTORS, (double)0.0);
00579 
00580    FillDetectorAverage(rBiasCurrent[polId], rBiasCurrentErr[polId], startTime);
00581    rBiasCurrent[polId].YTitle = "BiasCurrent, \\mu A";
00582 }
00583 
00584 void FillBeamCurrent(opencdev::LogReader *log_reader, int fill_id, EPolarimeterId polId, double startTime, map< Short_t, ResultMean > &rBeamCurrent, map< Short_t, ResultMean > &rBeamCurrentErr)
00585 {
00586    opencdev::result_t beam_mean_value;
00587 
00588    log_reader->query_fill("RHIC/BeamIons", fill_id, &beam_mean_value);
00589 
00590    for(opencdev::result_t::const_iterator it = beam_mean_value.begin(); it != beam_mean_value.end(); it++)
00591    {
00592       const string &key = it->first;
00593       const map<opencdev::cdev_time_t, double> &values = it->second;
00594 
00595       if ((gRunConfig.GetBeamId(polId) == kBLUE_BEAM) && (key != "bluDCCTtotal"))
00596       {
00597          continue;
00598       }
00599       else if ((gRunConfig.GetBeamId(polId) == kYELLOW_BEAM) && (key != "yelDCCTtotal"))
00600       {
00601          continue;
00602       }
00603 
00604       double value_acc = 0.0;
00605       int value_count = 0;
00606       for(map<opencdev::cdev_time_t, double>::const_iterator it2 = values.begin(); it2 != values.end(); it2++)
00607       {
00608          double value = it2->second;
00609          if ((value > 50.0) && (value < 9e37))
00610          {
00611             value_acc += value;
00612             value_count++;
00613          }
00614       }
00615       double beam_current = value_acc / value_count;
00616       Info("malpha", "Mean %s equals to %f", key.c_str(), beam_current);
00617 
00618       rBeamCurrent[polId].second[startTime].resize(N_DETECTORS);
00619       for(int i = 0; i < N_DETECTORS; i++)
00620       {
00621          rBeamCurrent[polId].second[startTime][i] = beam_current;
00622       }
00623       rBeamCurrentErr[polId].second[startTime].resize(N_DETECTORS);
00624       for(int i = 0; i < N_DETECTORS; i++)
00625       {
00626          rBeamCurrentErr[polId].second[startTime][i] = 0;
00627       }
00628    }
00629    FillDetectorAverage(rBeamCurrent[polId], rBeamCurrentErr[polId], startTime);
00630    rBeamCurrent[polId].YTitle = "Beam intensity (10^11 protons)";
00631 }
00632 
00633 
00635 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00636 {
00637    setbuf(stdout, NULL);
00638 
00639    // Create a default one
00640    gMeasInfo = new MeasInfo();
00641 
00642    // Do not attempt to recover files
00643    gEnv->SetValue("TFile.Recover", 0);
00644 
00645    MAlphaAnaInfo mAlphaAnaInfo;
00646    mAlphaAnaInfo.ProcessOptions(argc, argv);
00647    mAlphaAnaInfo.VerifyOptions();
00648 
00649    opencdev::LocalLogReader log_reader(mAlphaAnaInfo.GetSlowControlLogDir());
00650 
00651    gROOT->Macro("~/rootmacros/styles/style_malpha.C");
00652 
00653    string filelist = mAlphaAnaInfo.GetMListFullPath();
00654 
00655    Info("malpha", "Starting first pass...");
00656 
00657    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rhAmGain;
00658    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rhAmGainErr;
00659    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rhAmGainCorrected;
00660    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rhAmGainCorrectedErr;
00661    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rhGdGain_over_AmGain;
00662    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rhGdGain_over_AmGainErr;
00663    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rhAmGdGain_over_AmGain;
00664    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rhAmGdGain_over_AmGainErr;
00665    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rDeadLayerEnergy;
00666    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rDeadLayerEnergyErr;
00667    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rDeadLayerSize;
00668    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rDeadLayerSizeErr;
00669    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rBeamCurrent;
00670    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rBeamCurrentErr;
00671    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rBiasCurrent;
00672    map< Short_t, ResultMean > rBiasCurrentErr;
00673    double max_startTime = -1;
00674    double min_startTime = -1;
00675    map< Short_t, map<Time, string> > runNameD;
00676 
00677    // Fill chain with all input files from filelist
00678    TObject *o;
00679    TIter   *next = new TIter(utils::getFileList(filelist));
00680 
00681    // Loop over the runs and record the time of the last flattop measurement in the fill
00682    while (next && (o = (*next)()) )
00683    {
00684       string measId   = string(((TObjString*) o)->GetName());
00685       string fileName = mAlphaAnaInfo.GetResultsDir() + "/" + measId + "/" + measId + mAlphaAnaInfo.GetSuffix() + ".root";
00686       TFile f(fileName.c_str(), "READ");
00687 
00688       if (!f.IsOpen())
00689       {
00690          Error("malpha", "file not found. Skipping...");
00691          continue;
00692       }
00693 
00694       if (f.IsZombie())
00695       {
00696          Error("malpha", "file is zombie %s. Skipping...", fileName.c_str());
00697          continue;
00698       }
00699 
00700       Info("malpha", "Found file: %s", fileName.c_str());
00701 
00702       EventConfig *gMM = (EventConfig*) f.FindObjectAny("measConfig");
00703 
00704       if (!gMM)
00705       {
00706          Error("malpha", "MM not found. Skipping...");
00707          continue;
00708       }
00709 
00710       int      alphaSources = gMM->fMeasInfo->GetAlphaSourceCount();
00711       string   runName      = gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName();
00712       Short_t  polId        = gMM->fMeasInfo->fPolId;
00713       Double_t startTime    = gMM->fMeasInfo->fStartTime;
00714       Double_t ssh_endTime  = gMM->fMeasInfo->fStopTime;
00715 
00716       if ((gMM->fMeasInfo->RUNID == 70213)
00717           || (int(gMM->fMeasInfo->RUNID) == 17400) // this one takes too long to process
00718           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17514.101.alpha0")
00719           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17515.101.alpha0")
00720           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17517.101.alpha0")
00721           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17518.101.alpha0")
00722           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17519.101.alpha0")
00723           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17520.101.alpha0")
00724           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17521.101.alpha0")
00725           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17524.101.alpha0")
00726           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17526.101.alpha0")
00727           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17527.101.alpha0")
00728           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17529.101.alpha0")
00729           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17530.101.alpha0")
00730           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17533.101.alpha0")
00731           || (gMM->fMeasInfo->GetRunName() == "17534.101.alpha0"))
00732       {
00733          Info("malpha", "File %s is blacklisted. Skipping", fileName.c_str());
00734          continue;
00735       }
00736 
00737       if (runNameD[polId].count(startTime))
00738       {
00739          Error("malpha", "Duplicate time = %f, %s, %s",
00740                startTime, runName.c_str(), runNameD[polId][startTime].c_str());
00741          exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00742       }
00743       runNameD[polId][startTime] = runName;
00744 
00745       if ((max_startTime == -1) || (max_startTime < startTime))
00746       {
00747          max_startTime = startTime;
00748       }
00749       if ((min_startTime == -1) || (min_startTime > startTime))
00750       {
00751          min_startTime = startTime;
00752       }
00753 
00754       FillBiasCurrent(&log_reader, (EPolarimeterId)polId, startTime, ssh_endTime, rBiasCurrent, rBiasCurrentErr);
00755 
00756       int fill_id = gMM->fMeasInfo->GetFillId();
00757       if (fill_id)
00758       {
00759          FillBeamCurrent(&log_reader, fill_id, (EPolarimeterId)polId, startTime, rBeamCurrent, rBeamCurrentErr);
00760       }
00761 
00762       TH1F  *hAmGain = (TH1F*) f.FindObjectAny("hAmGain");
00763 
00764       FillFromHist(hAmGain, startTime, rhAmGain[polId], rhAmGainErr[polId]);
00765 
00766       if (alphaSources == 2)
00767       {
00768          TH1F  *hGdGain = (TH1F*) f.FindObjectAny("hGdGain");
00769          TH1F  *hAmGdGain = (TH1F*) f.FindObjectAny("hAmGdGain");
00770          TH1F  *hGdGain_over_AmGain = new TH1F((*hGdGain) / (*hAmGain));
00771          TH1F  *hAmGdGain_over_AmGain = new TH1F((*hAmGdGain) / (*hAmGain));
00772          TH1F  *hDeadLayerEnergy = (TH1F*) f.FindObjectAny("hDeadLayerEnergy");
00773          TH1F  *hDeadLayerSize = (TH1F*) f.FindObjectAny("hDeadLayerSize");
00774 
00775          FillFromHist(hGdGain_over_AmGain, startTime, rhGdGain_over_AmGain[polId], rhGdGain_over_AmGainErr[polId]);
00776          rhGdGain_over_AmGain[polId].YTitle = "g_Gd / g_Am";
00777          FillFromHist(hAmGdGain_over_AmGain, startTime, rhAmGdGain_over_AmGain[polId], rhAmGdGain_over_AmGainErr[polId]);
00778          rhAmGdGain_over_AmGain[polId].YTitle = "g_AmGd / g_Am";
00779          FillFromHist(hDeadLayerEnergy, startTime, rDeadLayerEnergy[polId], rDeadLayerEnergyErr[polId]);
00780          FillFromHist(hDeadLayerSize, startTime, rDeadLayerSize[polId], rDeadLayerSizeErr[polId]);
00781       }
00782    }
00783 
00784    TFile *f1 = new TFile(mAlphaAnaInfo.fOutputFileName.c_str(), "RECREATE");
00785    DrawObjContainer *oc = new DrawObjContainer(f1);
00786    PolarimeterIdSetConstIter iPolId;
00787 
00788    FillDeviceMaxMin(rhAmGain);
00789    FillDeviceMaxMin(rhGdGain_over_AmGain);
00790    FillDeviceMaxMin(rhAmGdGain_over_AmGain);
00791    FillDeviceMaxMin(rDeadLayerEnergy);
00792    FillDeviceMaxMin(rDeadLayerSize);
00793    FillDeviceMaxMin(rBiasCurrent);
00794    FillDeviceMaxMin(rBeamCurrent);
00795 
00796    map<int, vector<double> > slope;
00797 
00798    for (iPolId = gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.begin(); iPolId != gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.end(); ++iPolId)
00799    {
00800       Short_t polId = *iPolId;
00801       string  polIdName = RunConfig::AsString(*iPolId);
00802 
00803       oc->d[polIdName] = new DrawObjContainer(f1->mkdir(polIdName.c_str()));
00804       DrawObjContainer *sub_oc = oc->d[polIdName];
00805 
00806       slope[*iPolId] = DoAmGainCorrection(rhAmGain[polId], rhAmGainErr[polId], rBiasCurrent[polId], rhAmGainCorrected[polId], rhAmGainCorrectedErr[polId]);
00807 
00808       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hAmGain_by_day", rhAmGain[polId], rhAmGainErr[polId], runNameD[polId], min_startTime, max_startTime);
00809       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hAmGainCorrected_by_day", rhAmGainCorrected[polId], rhAmGainCorrectedErr[polId], runNameD[polId], min_startTime, max_startTime);
00810       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hGdGain_over_AmGain_by_day", rhGdGain_over_AmGain[polId], rhGdGain_over_AmGainErr[polId], runNameD[polId], min_startTime, max_startTime);
00811       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hAmGdGain_over_AmGain_by_day", rhAmGdGain_over_AmGain[polId], rhAmGdGain_over_AmGainErr[polId], runNameD[polId], min_startTime, max_startTime);
00812       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hDeadLayerEnergy_by_day", rDeadLayerEnergy[polId], rDeadLayerEnergyErr[polId], runNameD[polId], min_startTime, max_startTime);
00813       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hDeadLayerSize_by_day", rDeadLayerSize[polId], rDeadLayerSizeErr[polId], runNameD[polId], min_startTime, max_startTime);
00814       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hBiasCurrent_by_day", rBiasCurrent[polId], rBiasCurrentErr[polId], runNameD[polId], min_startTime, max_startTime);
00815       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hAmGain_by_run", rhAmGain[polId], rhAmGainErr[polId], runNameD[polId], 0, 0);
00816       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hAmGainCorrected_by_run", rhAmGainCorrected[polId], rhAmGainCorrectedErr[polId], runNameD[polId], 0, 0);
00817       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hGdGain_over_AmGain_by_run", rhGdGain_over_AmGain[polId], rhGdGain_over_AmGainErr[polId], runNameD[polId], 0, 0);
00818       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hAmGdGain_over_AmGain_by_run", rhAmGdGain_over_AmGain[polId], rhAmGdGain_over_AmGainErr[polId], runNameD[polId], 0, 0);
00819       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hDeadLayerEnergy_by_run", rDeadLayerEnergy[polId], rDeadLayerEnergyErr[polId], runNameD[polId], 0, 0);
00820       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hDeadLayerSize_by_run", rDeadLayerSize[polId], rDeadLayerSizeErr[polId], runNameD[polId], 0, 0);
00821       PlotMean(sub_oc, polIdName, "hBiasCurrent_by_run", rBiasCurrent[polId], rBiasCurrentErr[polId], runNameD[polId], 0, 0);
00822 
00823       PlotCorrelation(sub_oc, polIdName, "hBiasCurrent_AmGain", rBiasCurrent[polId], rBiasCurrentErr[polId], rhAmGain[polId], rhAmGainErr[polId]);
00824       PlotCorrelation(sub_oc, polIdName, "hBiasCurrent_DeadLayerSize", rBiasCurrent[polId], rBiasCurrentErr[polId], rDeadLayerSize[polId], rDeadLayerSizeErr[polId]);
00825       PlotCorrelation(sub_oc, polIdName, "hBiasCurrent_BeamCurrent", rBiasCurrent[polId], rBiasCurrentErr[polId], rBeamCurrent[polId], rBeamCurrentErr[polId]);
00826    }
00827 
00828    if (mAlphaAnaInfo.HasGraphBit())
00829    {
00830       TCanvas r("r");
00831       oc->SaveAllAs(DrawObjContainer::FORMAT_EPS, r, "^.*$", mAlphaAnaInfo.GetImageDir(), false);
00832    }
00833    oc->Write();
00834    f1->Close();
00835    delete f1;
00836 
00837    cout << "// ============= malpha generated for " << mAlphaAnaInfo.GetMListFileName() << " begin" << endl;
00838    cout << "//";
00839    for(int i = 0; i < argc; i++)
00840    {
00841       cout << " " << argv[i];
00842    }
00843    cout << endl;
00844    cout << "// version " << mAlphaAnaInfo.fAsymVersion << endl;
00845    cout << "map<int, vector<double> > slope; // {pol_id, det} -> slope" << endl;
00846    for (iPolId = gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.begin(); iPolId != gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.end(); ++iPolId)
00847    {
00848       cout << "slope[" << *iPolId << "].resize(" << N_DETECTORS << ");" << endl;
00849       for(int det = 0; det < N_DETECTORS; det++)
00850       {
00851          cout << "slope[" << *iPolId << "][" << det << "] = " << slope.at(*iPolId).at(det) << ";" << endl;
00852       }
00853    }
00854    cout << "// ============= malpha generated end" << endl;
00855 
00856    return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00857 }
